title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, a dialog is shown that does not have a good default folder. It displays the desktop, my computer, etc. The dialog should have a default folder set, for example, the default content location.
OB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog should have a default folder set, such as the default content location.
EB: The dialog currently does not have a good default folder set. It shows the desktop, my computer, etc.
SR: Set a default folder in the dialog that appears when importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button. The default folder could be the default content location.
